TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LocalizabilityAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class LocalizabilityAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class LocalizabilityAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=false, Inherited=true)

summary.span: 为二进制 XAML (BAML) 类或类成员指定本地化特性。

span.span: Specifies the localization attributes for a binary XAML (BAML) class or class member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此特性可以应用于类、 属性或方法。This attribute can be applied to a class, property, or method. 有关如何使用本地化属性的详细信息，请参阅[本地化属性和注释](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md)。For more information on how to use localization attributes, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory category) cil managed

summary.span: 使用指定的本地化类别初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified localization category.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Category As LocalizationCategory
public: property System::Windows::LocalizationCategory Category { System::Windows::LocalizationCategory get(); };

summary.span: 获取本地化特性的目标值的类别设置。

span.span: Gets the category setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.

value.span: 本地化特性的类别设置。

span.span: The category setting of the localization attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示本地化属性的可修改性设置。The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute. |类别设置Category setting|含义Meaning| |----------------------|-------------| ||资源不属于标准类别。Resource does not belong to a standard category.| ||时间较长的描述性文本块。A lengthy piece of descriptive text.| ||单个文本，如标题行。A single line of text, such as a title.| ||短文本字符串，如控件标签。A short text string, such as a control label.| || 或相关控件。A or related control.| || 或相关控件。A or related control.| ||A或相关控件，如。A or related control, such as .| ||A或相关控件，如。A or related control, such as .| ||A或相关控件，如。A or related control, such as .| || 或相关控件。A or related control.| || 或相关控件。A or related control.| || 或相关控件。A or related control.| ||A或另一个面板可以包含文本。A or other panel that can contain text.| ||[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] 数据。 data.| ||字体相关数据，例如字体系列、 字体样式或字体大小。Font-related data such as font family, font style, or font size.| ||从父节点继承类别。Inherits category from parent node.| ||不本地化此资源。Do not localize this resource. 这不适用于该资源的任何子节点。This does not apply to any child nodes of the resource.| ||此资源，或任何其类别将设置为及其子节点不本地化。Do not localize this resource, or any of its child nodes whose category is set to .| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示为一个按钮定义本地化属性的类别设置。The following code example shows the category settings of localization attributes defined for a button. [!code-xaml[AttributesSnippets#AttributesSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AttributesSnippets/CSharp/Attributes.xaml#attributessnippet1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Modifiability Modifiability { System::Windows::Modifiability get(); void set(System::Windows::Modifiability value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置本地化特性的目标值的可修改性设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the modifiability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.

value.span: 本地化特性的可修改性设置。

span.span: The modifiability setting of the localization attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示本地化属性的可修改性设置。The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute. |可修改性设置Modifiability setting|含义Meaning| |---------------------------|-------------| ||目标值可由本地化人员修改。Targeted value is modifiable by localizers.| ||目标值不能由本地化人员修改。Targeted value is not modifiable by localizers.| ||目标的值的可修改性继承其父节点。Targeted value's modifiability is inherited from its parent node.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示为一个按钮定义本地化属性的可修改性设置。The following code example shows the modifiability setting of localization attributes defined for a button. [!code-xaml[AttributesSnippets#AttributesSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AttributesSnippets/CSharp/Attributes.xaml#attributessnippet1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Readability Readability { System::Windows::Readability get(); void set(System::Windows::Readability value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置本地化特性的目标值的可读性设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the readability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.

value.span: 本地化特性的可读性设置。

span.span: The readability setting of the localization attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示本地化属性的可读性设置。The following table shows the readability settings of the localization attribute. |可读性设置Readability setting|含义Meaning| |-------------------------|-------------| ||目标值为可读文本。Targeted value is readable text.| ||目标值不可读。Targeted value is not readable.| ||目标的值的可读性继承其父节点。Targeted value's readability is inherited from its parent node.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示为文本块定义本地化属性的可读性设置。The following code example shows the readability setting of localization attributes defined for a text block. [!code-xaml[AttributesSnippets#AttributesSnippet4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AttributesSnippets/CSharp/Comments.xaml#attributessnippet4)]
